video.title: Angelo Rules
video.synopsis: Charismatic 12-year-old Angelo takes his best buddies Sherwood and Lola on all kinds of misadventures as they plot to escape their responsibilities.

episodes.synopsis: Angelo's parents want to sell his old toys. / Angelo must clean Joe Mama's litter box all week. / Angelo and Sherwood try to stay up super late.
episodes.title: Detention / Cat Box / Yakking It Up

episodes.synopsis: Angelo and his pals try to get a cupcake. / Angelo lures fans away from a sold-out concert. / Angelo and Sherwood broke Mom’s favorite statue.
episodes.title: The Greatest Free Sample Ever / Go Mental Fest / Clean Break

episodes.synopsis: Angelo and Sherwood want a cool new product. / Angelo learns Mr. Foot's pop quiz schedule. / Angelo helps Butterfingers get picked first in gym class.
episodes.title: Battle Underwear / Pop Quiz / Picked Last

episodes.synopsis: Angelo secretly listens to the radio in school to win a contest. / Peter emails the wrong report to Mr. Foot. / Sherwood swallows Peter’s goldfish.
episodes.title: Lords of the Prize / Bolivia Exports Farts / A Fish Called Mr. Bubble

episodes.synopsis: Who’s stealing the snacks at school? / Angelo and his friends defend against Manetti's spitballs. / Lola might beat Manetti in a video game challenge.
episodes.title: Snack Thief / Spitball Wars / Let Manetti Win

episodes.synopsis: Angelo forgot to finish his project. / Angelo conspires to get his sister to do his chores. / Angelo plans for Dad to watch his show somewhere else.
episodes.title: A Longer Recess / Chore Wars / Changing the Channel

episodes.synopsis: Sherwood is too short to ride the zip line. / A skateboarder is signing autographs, but the line is too long. / Angelo needs to make Peter less cute.
episodes.title: Riding the Dragon Tail / The Great Wait / Adorable Horrible Peter

episodes.synopsis: Angelo solves what happened to Peter's toy rabbit. / Angelo wants to stop Mom's new hobby. / Angelo arranges a free period by tricking Coach Zonka.
episodes.title: Who Killed the Rabbit? / Stop the Experimental Music / No Substitute

episodes.synopsis: Angelo alters Mom's casserole recipe. / Angelo convinces Mom of the dangers of horse riding. / Angelo sells Mom's precious painting at a yard sale.
episodes.title: The Casserole / Out of the Saddle / Angelo's Blunder

episodes.synopsis: Angelo helps Lola get her school photo retaken. / Angelo wants Elena's new J-Pod. / Angelo pretends to be a skateboarder so he can judge a contest.
episodes.title: The Sneeze / Shame of Lame / Here Comes the Judge

episodes.synopsis: When Elena's heart is broken, she turns into a meanie. / Angelo fakes being sick and stays home from school. / Angelo wants to trade in his gifts.
episodes.title: Break Up / The Fake Sick Day / The Kid Who Has Everything

episodes.synopsis: Angelo plots to avoid a 2K run. / Angelo tries to get out of going to the beach. / Angelo and Sherwood want new action figures from the toy store.
episodes.title: Zonka's Death March / The Beach / Collect Them All

episodes.synopsis: Manetti has a crush on Elena that drives her crazy. / Sherwood is assigned to tutor Manetti. / Lola and Sherwood have a fight, which worries Angelo.
episodes.title: Manetti's Crush / Manetti Must Not Fail / Help! My Friends Are Falling in Love!

episodes.synopsis: Mom invites a needy artist to stay with them. / Butterfingers wants to ask Monica to the school dance. / Mr. Foot is going to dissect a frog in class!
episodes.title: The Brush Off / A Little Romance / Mission: Frog

episodes.synopsis: A rock band has hidden a prize in a box of cereal. / Angelo and friends plan a big heist of the teachers lounge. / Angelo helps his sister get a job.
episodes.title: USB Mine / School Heist / Working Hard

episodes.synopsis: Angelo and Sherwood want to watch a horror movie on TV. / Angelo juggles his video game with his chores and homework. / Peter has a new trumpet!
episodes.title: Scary Movie / Final Countdown / Thar He Blows!

episodes.synopsis: Oh, no -- it's Manetti's birthday. / Angelo's dad will be presenting to the class. / Angelo and his friends pull off the robbery of the century!
episodes.title: Yesterbirthday / Career Day / Break In

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Foot won't show the friends' homemade film in class. / Butterfingers can't make a basketball shot. / Angelo and Sherwood must get Peter to bed.
episodes.title: Director's Cut / One Shot / The Chimp Sleeps Tonight

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Foot sends Sherwood to a school for the gifted. / Angelo has forgotten about a history presentation. / Angelo tries to win a prize at the mall.
episodes.title: Savant Idiot / Face the Music / The Thousandth

episodes.synopsis: Manetti isn’t afraid of anything. / Sherwood doesn't want to run for class captain. / Angelo and his friends win a futuristic skateboard.
episodes.title: Fearless / Dirty Politics / Friend vs. Friend

episodes.synopsis: Miss Perla decides to put on a show about Slobber's music! / Angelo has the house to himself. / Manetti's little brother picks a fight with Angelo.
episodes.title: The Audition Mission / Tea Time / Wanna Piece of Me?

episodes.synopsis: The girls slipped a list of the cutest boys in class into Manetti's bag. / Angelo can't get ready for school because of Elena. / Angelo has a cold.
episodes.title: The List / Shower Up / The Fever

episodes.synopsis: Angelo buys a handbag for his mom. / Manetti has staked out a piece of sidewalk, and no one is allowed on it. / Angelo can't afford Cathy's new cakes.
episodes.title: In the Bag / King of the Sidewalk / Money Money Money

episodes.synopsis: Peter is a sleepwalker. / Elena threatens to show Angelo's test to their parents. / Sherwood is meant to become a teacher, like Mr Foot.
episodes.title: Cereal Zombie / Picture Perfect / Career Test

episodes.synopsis: The class is given a pop quiz because of Sherwood. / Angelo has uttered a curse word in front of Peter. / Butterfingers' big brother mocks everyone.
episodes.title: Sherwood's Fault / Curse / Cool Kid

episodes.synopsis: Mom's book club would be better off meeting somewhere else! / Angelo's Mom invites Manetti to spend the day. / Angelo plans a party in a hurry.
episodes.title: The Book Club / Menettied / Ticking Clock
